name: Messy Christmas
description:
♥ Much love this Christmas from Palgal and YlangYlang ♥
❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄❄ ❅❅❅ ❄❄ ❅❅❅

You wake up to find yourself in a strangers house, it seems cold outside, you don't want to leave just yet. The presents are everywhere. They are everywhere!

You say to yourself,

"Just a little peek, maybe I'll just peel the paper back a little so that I can predict the contents of the package from the information I can muster from a one square millimeter hole."
It could be anything! A cruise? A fire? An amorphous blob?

But that's not what happens. And the beast of regret and shame clutches at your heart, "you've opened some one else's presents." You say to yourself, as you take a swig of Crown Royal whiskey and sloppily remove all of your clothing except for your socks and take a seat in the Salon by the fire.
There is no going back. You now wish for a Christmas miracle...

You realize that you've been Santa Clause all along and its totally cool, you can do whatever you want.

There is a fire in the kitchen, but it is no big deal.

Suddenly you are awake, you find yourself sitting up in bed shouting "Messy Christmas!" It's the second time this week but you still can't decide where you are, the walls seems so unfamiliar and your heart tightens with the same ache you had experienced in your dream.

Inception.

You've missed the bus to school. You jolt out of bed, but now you realize that you are in your old bedroom and you are drenched in sweat. You had the heat up too high, but it is Christmas day and you have presents too!!

Enjoy the bounty

No worriesss!!!!!!!!!!♥♥♥♥(ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧

♥ ♥♥ ♥♥ ♥♥ ♥♥ ♥♥ ♥ peace and love ♥ ♥♥ ♥♥ ♥♥ ♥♥ ♥
